item.title: 计数质数
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 计数质数 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/count-primes/ 一开始直接暴力，隐约感觉会超时，果然不出我所料 class Solution: def countPrimes(self, n: int) -> int: counts = 0 for i in range(n): if self.isprime(i): counts += 1 return counts def isprime(self,n): from itertools import count if n <=1: return False for i in count(2): if i* i > n:
